s.text: Another article says one reason Rudy Giuliani won re-election was his strong connection to New York's long-neglected outer-borough residents.

An article says the two camps can learn from each other: Indies offer character development and plot, while big-budget movies create "a coveted gloss and Zeitgeist energy that cannot be matched in the world of the shoestring budget."
They lose or come uncomfortably close to losing if they don't."
We know perfectly well that children are most at risk at home, from their own families and adult friends."
